title: Russia opens case against CNN reporters who covered Kursk incursion
content: The FSB said they would be placed on Russia’s wanted list. Under Russian law, the maximum penalty for illegally crossing the border is five years in prison.
summary: The FSB said they would be placed on Russia’s wanted list. Under Russian law, the maximum penalty for illegally crossing the border is five years in prison.

title: Second-largest diamond ever, 2,492 carats, unearthed in Botswana
content: Lucara Diamond discovered the world's second largest diamond in Botswana's Karowe mine using Mega Diamond Recovery X-ray technology.
summary: Lucara Diamond discovered the world's second largest diamond in Botswana's Karowe mine using Mega Diamond Recovery X-ray technology.

title: New arrests in smuggling of migrants who died in a Texas truck
content: Guatemalan officials announced the dismantling of a smuggling ring behind the deadliest incident of its kind on U.S. soil, in which 53 migrants died.
summary: Guatemalan officials announced the dismantling of a smuggling ring behind the deadliest incident of its kind on U.S. soil, in which 53 migrants died.

title: How many women presidents and prime ministers have served in your lifetime?
content: The U.S. has never had a woman president but it’s far from alone. Enter your birthday to find out the number of women who have led around the world.
summary: The U.S. has never had a woman president but it’s far from alone. Enter your birthday to find out the number of women who have led around the world.

title: Who was Mike Lynch, the British tech entrepreneur in superyacht sinking?
content: The software millionaire was once considered Britain’s version of Bill Gates. The yacht trip followed his acquittal on U.S. fraud charges related to a tech deal.
summary: The software millionaire was once considered Britain’s version of Bill Gates. The yacht trip followed his acquittal on U.S. fraud charges related to a tech deal.

title: Mike Lynch’s body is fifth found in yacht wreckage; daughter is last missing
content: The body of Lynch, 59, was recovered from the wreckage of the Bayesian, according to an Italian government official. The Bayesian yacht sank in a storm this week.
summary: The body of Lynch, 59, was recovered from the wreckage of the Bayesian, according to an Italian government official. The Bayesian yacht sank in a storm this week.

title: Taylor Swift opens up about Vienna concert attack threat: ‘New sense of fear’
content: Authorities accused two people of planning attacks on Swift’s Vienna shows, prompting their cancellation. Swift said she waited until the end of her Eras Tour European leg to speak out.
summary: Authorities accused two people of planning attacks on Swift’s Vienna shows, prompting their cancellation. Swift said she waited until the end of her Eras Tour European leg to speak out.

title: A same-sex penguin pair captured hearts. After one died, the other sang.
content: Sphen and Magic raised two chicks at an Australian aquarium, increased awareness about rainbow families and inspired a float at the Sydney Mardi Gras Pride parade.
summary: Sphen and Magic raised two chicks at an Australian aquarium, increased awareness about rainbow families and inspired a float at the Sydney Mardi Gras Pride parade.

title: U.S. sanctions former Haitian president Martelly for role in drug trade
content: The U.S. Treasury Department said the singer turned politician sponsored several of the gangs that have waged a campaign of terror in Haiti.
summary: The U.S. Treasury Department said the singer turned politician sponsored several of the gangs that have waged a campaign of terror in Haiti.

title: Five bodies found in sunken superyacht, officials say
content: So far four bodies had been brought to shore from the wreckage of the Bayesian superyacht off the coast of Sicily, an official said.
summary: So far four bodies had been brought to shore from the wreckage of the Bayesian superyacht off the coast of Sicily, an official said.

title: Grief and anger in Israel as recovered hostages are laid to rest
content: Over the rumble of gunfire and explosions from Gaza, families in southern Israel eulogized their loved ones and bemoaned not being able to save them.
summary: Over the rumble of gunfire and explosions from Gaza, families in southern Israel eulogized their loved ones and bemoaned not being able to save them.

title: The student revolution that toppled a government
content: After weeks of student-led protests in Bangladesh, Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the country. Now the students and the military have formed an interim government. Can they make lasting political change?
summary: After weeks of student-led protests in Bangladesh, Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the country. Now the students and the military have formed an interim government. Can they make lasting political change?

title: Iran signals promised strike on Israel may not be imminent
content: Iran said a response to the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh “must be carefully calibrated” to avoid hurting prospects of a Gaza cease-fire.
summary: Iran said a response to the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh “must be carefully calibrated” to avoid hurting prospects of a Gaza cease-fire.

title: U.S. Embassy denies Russian accusations of role in Ukraine incursion
content: Russia’s Foreign Ministry condemned reporting by U.S. media into areas controlled by Ukrainian forces.
summary: Russia’s Foreign Ministry condemned reporting by U.S. media into areas controlled by Ukrainian forces.

title: Police arrest man in Pakistan accused of fueling riots in Britain
content: Police in Pakistan accuse Farhan Asif of amplifying false information that helped spur far-right and anti-immigrant riots across Britain.
summary: Police in Pakistan accuse Farhan Asif of amplifying false information that helped spur far-right and anti-immigrant riots across Britain.

title: World’s oldest person, whose secret was avoiding ‘toxic people,’ dies at 117
content: María Branyas Morera, a U.S.-born Spaniard, died in her sleep. Her family said she recently spoke of nearing death and that she would miss daily mundanities like drinking coffee.
summary: María Branyas Morera, a U.S.-born Spaniard, died in her sleep. Her family said she recently spoke of nearing death and that she would miss daily mundanities like drinking coffee.

title: An elite rock climber lost his vision, then found a way to climb blind
content: There are two ways to tell the story of Jesse Dufton. One is about a talented blind rock climber. The other — the more complete one — is a love story.
summary: There are two ways to tell the story of Jesse Dufton. One is about a talented blind rock climber. The other — the more complete one — is a love story.

title: Switzerland will pay $58K for the best ideas to remove munitions from lakes
content: Munitions were buried in Alpine lakes, some more than 100 years ago. Now the country is seeking ways to get rid of them.
summary: Munitions were buried in Alpine lakes, some more than 100 years ago. Now the country is seeking ways to get rid of them.

title: U.S. veteran who fled child porn charges now flies drones for Russia
content: Wilmer Puello-Mota, a veteran who fled the United States in January, has appeared in Russian military propaganda videos touting his experience.
summary: Wilmer Puello-Mota, a veteran who fled the United States in January, has appeared in Russian military propaganda videos touting his experience.

title: Hamas says Biden shows ‘blind bias’ toward Israel in cease-fire talks
content: The row between Hamas and Biden comes as Secretary of State Antony Blinken shuttled between Israel, Egypt and Qatar on a mission to pressure all sides.
summary: The row between Hamas and Biden comes as Secretary of State Antony Blinken shuttled between Israel, Egypt and Qatar on a mission to pressure all sides.

title: Divers search sunken yacht as entrepreneur, five others, remain missing
content: Tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and at least two Americans are among the missing after the British-flagged yacht Bayesian sank off the northern coast of Sicily.
summary: Tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and at least two Americans are among the missing after the British-flagged yacht Bayesian sank off the northern coast of Sicily.

title: Israeli military recovers bodies of 6 hostages in Gaza operation
content: The Israel Defense Forces said it recovered the bodies of Yagev Buchshtab, Alexander Dancyg, Avraham Munder, Yoram Metzger, Nadav Popplewell and Chaim Peri.
summary: The Israel Defense Forces said it recovered the bodies of Yagev Buchshtab, Alexander Dancyg, Avraham Munder, Yoram Metzger, Nadav Popplewell and Chaim Peri.

title: Man accused of killing 42 women escapes police custody in Kenya
content: Collins Jumaisi Khalusha, who was being held at a Nairobi police station, is said to have escaped by cutting through wire mesh in holding cells and scaling the perimeter walls.
summary: Collins Jumaisi Khalusha, who was being held at a Nairobi police station, is said to have escaped by cutting through wire mesh in holding cells and scaling the perimeter walls.
